Installation

  • Clone the Open Social repository in your developing branch.
  • Follow the steps described the Installation guidelines on Github and complete the Drupal installation.
  • Check that your Installation works and Open social is your default theme.
  • In your terminal go the social_base folder and run npm install.

Usage

  • In the folder social_base first run gulp init and then run gulp (default task)
